info.name: modulo squares - int math
info.description: I rewrote my old modulo squares in purely integer arithmetic, while trying to make it as compact as possible

renderpass.code:
#define M(f)float((x+((y+t)%f)+y+((x+t)%f))%256)/256.
void mainImage(out vec4 O,in vec2 I) {int x=int(I.x);int y=int(I.y);int t=-iFrame/2;O=vec4(M(64),0,M(128),1);}
renderpass.name: Image
